title: Silverstein: balance sheets are best drivers of performance now
itunes:title: Silverstein: balance sheets are best drivers of performance now
description:
Deutsche Bank's Josh Silverstein discusses the best opportunities in the oil patch. He joins Tom Keene and Michael McKee on Bloomberg Surveillance.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
